Jose.src.characters

Class Boo

  • java.lang.Object
    • Jose.src.characters.Character
      • Jose.src.characters.Boo

  • public class Boo
extends Character
    The boo enemy, ghost that only moves when the player is turned away from him.
    Author:
    Dzejrou

        Constructor, set's all necessary attributes and calls Character's constructor.
        Parameters:
        m - Reference to the level's tile map.
        pos_x - X axis starting coordinate.
        pos_y - Y axis starting coordinate.
        v - Reference to the game's view.
        p - Reference to the player.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(long delta)
        Updates the boo.
        Specified by:
        update in class Character
        Parameters:
        delta - Time passed since the last update call.

      • change_direction

        private void change_direction()
        Changes the direction of the boo and his sprite. This will make the boo stare at the player even when it is inactive.

      • draw

        public void draw(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g)
        Draws the boo.
        Specified by:
        draw in class Character
        Parameters:
        g - Reference to the game's graphics context.

      • activate

        private void activate()
        Changes the state to active. Also changes the sprite.

      • deactivate

        private void deactivate()
        Changes the state to inactive. Also changes the sprite.

      • main_hitbox

        private org.newdawn.slick.geom.Rectangle main_hitbox()
        Returns the main hitbox which kills the player upon contact.
        Returns:
        Hitbox rectangle.

      • weak_hitbox

        private org.newdawn.slick.geom.Rectangle weak_hitbox()
        Returns the secondary hitbox that kills the boo upon contact with the player. The constants on x axis and width are used so that the weak hitbox is in the middle and is less wide than the main hitbox rectangle, so the player cannot kill the boo while jumping upwards (will hit the main hitbox first).
        Returns:
        Weak spot rectangle.

      • draw_debug

        private void draw_debug(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g)
        Draws hitboxes in the debug mode.
        Parameters:
        g - The game's graphics context.

      • is_dead

        public boolean is_dead()
        Used to check if this character died.
        Specified by:
        is_dead in class Character
        Returns:
        True if the boo died, false otherwise.

      • die

        public void die()
        Kills the boo.
        Specified by:
        die in class Character
